attributes.action: Stop long term Gym Membership Contracts
attributes.additional_details: To put a stop to any Gym or Health club being allowed to tie anyone in to a contract for any long term. All contracts should have a maximum of 1 months notice to cancel and a 7 day cooling off period once a contract is signed. No Health club should be allowed to tie anyone into a minimum of 12 months and have no cooling of period.
